import vue from 'vue'
import vueRouter from 'vue-router'
import Home from '../views/Home.vue'
import Users from '../views/Users.vue'
vue.use(vueRouter)

const routes = [
    { path: '/home', component: Home },
    { path: '/use', component: User },
  ]

  const router = new vueRouter({
    routes
    })

export default router
